revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Guillemot |model=Hercules HWNRi-300 |revision= |upc= |ean= |asin= |price= |est_release_date= |fcc_date=12/02/2009 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Edimax |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=NAM5090629 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8196B |cpu1_cspeed= |fla1=4 |fla1_brand= |fla1_model= |ram1=16 |ram1_brand=Zentel |ram1_model=A3V28S40ETP-G5 |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8192SE |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn= |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |sw_brand= |sw_model= |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |wan_ports=1 |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bgn |default_ssid=Hercules |default_ssid_regex=^Hercules$ |default_ip=192.168.2.1 |default_user= |default_pass=123456 |oui= |oui_eth= }} {{TagLine|Hercules Wireless N Router 802.11n}} :[ftp://ftp.hercules.com/wifi/manuals/HWNRi-300/01-eng_Hercules_Wireless_N_HWNRi-300.pdf Manual]
"1242-00000290-01Z" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos. :Per the manual, the default SSID is '''Hercules'''.
